620010357247979520.text: Narrative inherently embraces simple causes, personal agency, single perspective, limited context. A medium for empathy won't be stories.

620008479068033024.text: A medium can show context and connections. Without context, you assume ill intentions in others. WIth context, you can think systemically.

620007376817516544.text: Empathy results from seeing and understanding the larger system that you and others are embedded in, seeing *why* others act as they do.
